1: <pb/><e>Jun b'it tzon̈ c'ayb'ani. Sb'it jun tic eb' yin̈tilal vin̈aj Coré.</e> <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, tzach in nib'ej val icha junoc noc' c'ultaquil chej tz'ec' sayoj a' yuj taquin̈tial.</t>
2: <t>Ach Dios pitzan, a val in pensar tzach nib'anochi, ¿b'aq'uin̈ ol in c'och d'a ichan̈ junelxo?</t>
3: <t>C'ual d'ac'val voq'ui. Axon̈ej voq'uel tic ayoch in vaeloc, yacb'an sb'uchvaj eb' anima d'ayin sc'anb'ejn̈ej eb': ¿B'ajtil ay jun a Diosal chi? xchi eb'.</t>
4: <t>Ayic tzin naan juntzan̈ tic, ste och pitz'an d'a in c'ool. Tzin naancoti ayic ay in ec' d'a scal eb' anima, yic tzin cuchb'an eb', yic tzon̈ b'at d'a a templo. Man̈xo jantacoc yel yav eb' yuj tzalajc'olal yed' ac'oj yuj diosal. Nivan q'uin̈ ton val jun chi'.</t>
5: <t>¿Tas val yuj schab'axq'ue in c'ool? ¿Tas yuj somchaj in pensar? Ach in Diosal, ayach och yipoc in c'ool, olto val vach' lolonel d'ayach, in Columal, in Diosal aji.</t>
6: <t>Ach in Diosal te cusc'olal vaj ticnaic, yuj chi', man̈ jantacoc ach in naancot d'a yol yic a' Jordán yed' d'a yol yic svitzal Hermón yed' svitzal Mizar.</t>
7: <t>Icha sc'an̈ yem pon̈oljoc a a' d'a nivac pajav, icha val chi' juntzan̈ nivac cusc'olal tz'ec' d'a vib'an̈ uuj.</t>
8: <t>Ach Jehová, a d'a c'ualil tza ch'oxn̈ej a vach'c'olal d'ayin, axo d'ac'valil, max in och vaan ach in b'itani, max in och pax vaan in lesalvi d'ayach, yujto a ach tzac' in q'uinal.</t>
9: <t>Svalan icha tic d'ayach: Ach in Columal, ¿tas yuj tzin b'atcan satc'olal uuj? Yuj chi' cusnac in c'ool ayic tzin b'eyeq'ui, yujto tzin yixtej val eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin, xin chi.</t>
10: <t>Svab' val syail, icha val to smac'jipoj in b'aquil b'aj tzin yixtej eb' ajc'ool chi'. Junjun rato sb'uchvaj eb' d'ayin sc'anb'an eb': ¿B'ajtil ay jun a Diosal chi'? xchi eb'.</t>
11: <t>¿Tas val yuj schab'axq'ue in c'ool? ¿Tas yuj somchaj in pensar? Ach in Diosal, ayach och yipoc in c'ool, olto val vach' lolonel d'ayach, in Columal, in Diosal aji.</t>
